channel.title: Compiler Problem= Javac is not recongnized
channel.description:
Well, I am starting to make a server. When i start the compiler, an error pops out in the command window saying javac is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file, Press any key to continue... I have set my environmental variables. Here they are. I got JDK 6u5
CLASSPATH Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
The help would be great.

item.title: Compiler Problem= Javac is not recongnized

item.description:
@dragon_boy wrote:

Thanks! It compiled but it still says javac is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file, Press any key to continue…

item.title: Compiler Problem= Javac is not recongnized
item.dc:creator: @dragon_boy dragon boy
item.description:
@dragon_boy wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:2, topic:191973”] @echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compile/Run server. echo Please wait as your server is being compiled "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java echo Starting server! java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server tskill java pause

Nothing fancy. Oh well.[/quote]
Where do I put this?

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler Problem= Javac is not recongnized

item.title: Compiler Problem= Javac is not recongnized
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title DePredaTe's Compile/Run server.
echo Please wait as your server is being compiled
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java
echo Starting server!
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
tskill java
pause

Nothing fancy. Oh well.

Read full topic
